author: RISadler
title: Best helicopter ever!
review: For me this is the best helicopter ever. Construction is rudimentary by today's standards, but the result is something that looks and plays exactly like a chopper. LEGO should bring this back as a mini-classic.

author: hustla187
title: Nice for a Helicopter
review: This is a nice helicopter made by Lego back in 1977. I like the windshield pieces alot and gives this set detail. The rotors rotate which is a pretty good part of this set. I don't see anything bad about this, so it deserves a 5.
